subSections.title: Definitions
subSections.text:
{{zh-hanzi}}

# to [[hide]]; to [[cover#Verb|cover]]; to [[shield]]
# to [[conceal]]; to [[cover up]]
# [[hidden]]; [[concealed]]
# [[profound]]; [[subtle]]; [[delicate]]
# [[fact]]s one wish to [[hide]]; [[feeling]]s or [[trouble]]s one wishes to [[keep]] to oneself; [[secret]]
# [[secretly]]; [[inwardly]]
